titleStmt.title: Where the kynges hyghnes is enfourmed, that dyuers and sondrye wrytynges and bokes ...
Proclamations. 1535-01-01
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)

notesStmt.note: Imprint from STC; imprint as filmed too dark to read.
